Docs.param: The authentication classes to sign-in and sign-out users.
Describes the authentication class the bot should use if the user does not specify a authentication class name.
Indicates whether the bot should start the sign in flow when the user sends a message to the bot or triggers a message extension.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Authentications As Dictionary(Of String, IAuthentication(Of TState))

Docs.summary: The authentication classes to sign-in and sign-out users. Key uniquely identifies each authentication.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.AutoSignIn : Microsoft.Teams.AI.SelectorAsync with get, set

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the bot should start the sign in flow when the user sends a message to the bot or triggers a message extension. If the selector returns false, the bot will not start the sign in flow before routing the activity to the bot logic. If the selector is not provided, the sign in will always happen for valid activities.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Default : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Describes the authentication class the bot should use if the user does not specify a authentication class name. If the value is not provided, the first one in `Authentications` setting will be used as the default one.
